CustomField.formula: AND( Associated_Opportunity_Type__c = 'Revenue Opportunity', CONTAINS( Owner:User.UserRole.Name, 'Partnerships' ), NOT( OR( CONTAINS( Owner:User.UserRole.Name, 'COR' ), CONTAINS( Owner:User.UserRole.Name, 'SEL' ), CONTAINS( Owner:User.UserRole.Name, 'STR' ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Entry Criteria Met for Chan. Rev. Oppty.
